<div class="positioning">Cognitive Neuroscientist meets Football</div>

Artur Czeszumski, PhD, is a cognitive neuroscientist and data scientist specialising in the measurement and computational modelling of human cognition. He currently works as a data scientist in football club and serves as a lecturer at the University of Warsaw. His work combines cognitive neuroscience and data science to investigate cognitive and perceptual mechanisms underlying football talent development.
